mapper.select: select p.product_id id, p.product_name name, p.product_thumb thumb, o.option_id oid, o.option_name optionName, o.option_origin_price originPrice, o.option_market_price marketPrice, b.brand_id bId, b.brand_name brandName from options o inner join product p on (p.product_id = o.product_id) inner join brand b on (p.brand_id = b.brand_id) where o.option_id = #{optionId}
